product_name: National Geographic Trails Illustrated Allegheny South Trail Map - Allegheny National Forest
long_description: This National Geographic Trails Illustrated Allegheny South trail map offers clear, detailed coverage of the south part of the Allegheny National Forest in Pennsylvania.
